body: Modular ability is not stored in the permanent as it has an implementation.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Arcbound overseer does not put counters on creatures with modular

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 26ad486b9af9 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on September 22, 2012 11:43:04_

Modular ability is not stored in the permanent as it has an implementation.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=296_
